user.description: Integrate your Seplos Battery Management System (BMS) with Home Assistant to access detailed sensor readings, alarm notifications, and valuable telemetry data. For installation and troubleshooting, visit the [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/flip555/seplos_bms_ha).

error.invalid_port: The specified USB port is invalid or inaccessible. Ensure the Seplos BMS is connected correctly.
error.connection: Unable to connect to Seplos BMS. Check if the BMS is powered on and properly connected.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Visit the GitHub repository for support or to raise an issue.
